scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn test:it && yarn test:e2e
scripts.test:tmp: mocha --no-timeouts test/coverage/custom/* # TEST AND REMOVE SCRIPT AFTER PR 151 MERGE !!
scripts.coverage:sandbox: coverage-tests create-tests --remote=$CVG_TESTS_REMOTE && yarn test:coverage && coverage-tests process-report
scripts.coverage:prod: coverage-tests create-tests --remote=$CVG_TESTS_REMOTE && yarn test:coverage && coverage-tests process-report --send-report prod
scripts.test:coverage: env APPLITOOLS_BATCH_NAME='JS Coverage Tests: eyes-webdriverio-4' APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) XUNIT_FILE=coverage-test-report.xml mocha-parallel-tests --no-timeouts --reporter spec-xunit-file --max-parallel 15 "{test/coverage/generic/*.spec.js,../sdk-coverage-tests/coverage-tests/custom/**/*.spec.js}"
scripts.preversion: bongo preversion && yarn test && yarn coverage:prod
scripts.stop-chromedriver: ps ax | grep chromedriver | grep port=4444 | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kill -9
